TopicTitle: How to make a wait to a birthday bearable?

Articles.Content:
I am expecting a iPod touch, and Tomadachi Life for 3ds on my bday, which is June 18. How do you make the wait bearable?

Edited June 17, 2014 by kenbobo
Fixed Prefix.
I haven't had a birthday party in a long time, but i'd just play some video games if you're really itching for some cake.

its easy: get old.

i dont want anything you can afford to get me. i dont need to eat any more cake. dont remind me that im old. get off my lawn.

Edited June 17, 2014 by Nuke
needed more lawn

"The passage of time is relentless and unforgiving. The desire to speed up the journey from the cradle to the grave is nothing short of perverted"

-said my Dad to me when I was anxious for Christmas to come

Play KSP.

Lots of KSP.

Give in to the urge... Let things happen.

I was never here.....
Tell yourself that it's not coming. It will be a normal few days until then.

How do you make the wait bearable?

Get older.

How do you make the wait bearable?

Get older.

Also, iPod touch sucks. You can get Android tablets with much higher specs for much cheaper.
I'll use these tips to get over the wait for GTA V's release on actual gaming devices (PC)

"The passage of time is relentless and unforgiving. The desire to speed up the journey from the cradle to the grave is nothing short of perverted"

-said my Dad to me when I was anxious for Christmas to come

Eh. Your dad is creepy.

I am expecting a iPod touch, and Tomadachi Life for 3ds on my bday, which is June 18. How do you make the wait bearable?

Do not expect anything If you do you only get restless and possibly disappointed.
